Text.Value: Entrance is hidden behind the wardrobe. You'll find a key in one of the crates.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing up.] Already dismissing us from his mind.
EditorData.logicalname: Salazon does not give us key

Text.Value: I'm with Zarys - do not cast that spell.
Down you go, then. They'll be on us soon, so if you're looking to trade you'd best be quick.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing up.] He's gone from panicked guard to faux-authority very quickly, as if he's chiding us for having spooked him

Text.Value: Zarys! ZARYS, HELP!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] From crouched, Salazon stands up panicked and jumpy, calling out for backup.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: Calling to his boss for protection like a child

Text.Value: That ain't the pass-phrase!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] [DUPE] From crouched, Salazon stands up frantic and aggressive, raising the firebolt spell in a threatening guesture, ready to attack.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: Salazon gets up frantically as he exclaims his line.

Text.Value: Wait!
Recite Rugan's pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
Recite Rugan's pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
Right, look - if it's business you're about, then be about it. Flaming Fist could be on us any minute.

EditorData.NodeContext: Salazon stands up. We've intimidated him but he's trying to cling on to some scrap of authority, letting us down with a warning as if it's his choice.

Text.Value: I am magic. Cast that spell - you'll only hurt yourself.
Do NOT make me angry!
B-burn, bastard!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] From crouched, Salazon stands up frantic and aggressive, raising the firebolt spell in a threatening guesture, ready to attack.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: We've said the wrong thing, and now he's panicking and setting off a detonation

Text.Value: I just want to trade.

EditorData.stateContext: Salazon is crouching behind the shelves

Text.Value: Gah, Helm's orbs. Thought you were Flaming Fist.

EditorData.NodeContext: Salazon stands up (relieved), he cancels his fire bolt spell. He goes from jumpy to relieved - we know the pass phrase so he won't have to get in a fight

Text.Value: Stay out of my head!

EditorData.NodeContext: Panicked, frightened
EditorData.StateChangeTags: Character is crouching behind shelves with fire bolt spell ready

Text.Value: Attack him.
Prepare to attack.
*You spot a man crouching between the shelves - just as he spots you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] Salazon is crouched behind a crate and is peering over the top, stealthily keeping watch. Looping idle. He notices the player, and readies a firebolt spell in his left hand > idle
EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves].

Text.Value: Fire is in my blood. Do it. Let's see who survives.
One of our own, eh? All right, down you go.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing]. Realising we're from a similar criminal organisation - trusting us slightly more, but only about as much as one thief ever trusts another

Text.Value: Careful. You won't kill me, but you will make me mad.
*He freezes, waiting on your next word.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: <KrisB> [Salazon] Loop version of the crouching mocap, [Player]  Throwing hands in the air to show Salazon we mean no harm (Need an idle state for this)

Text.Value: Down you go - entrance is behind the wardrobe. Here's the key.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing up] He casually chucks the player a key.

Text.Value: *A human man awaits you, a spell crackling at his fingertips.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] Salazon is crouched behind a crate and is peering over the top, stealthily keeping watch with a firebolt spell in his hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves with Fire Bolt ready].

Text.Value: Read his mind.
I know the pass-phrase: 'Little serpent, long shadow'.
Entrance is hidden behind the wardrobe - here's the key.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing up] He casually chucks the player a key.

Text.Value: ... let's say I'd rather not fight, then. What's your business down here?

EditorData.NodeContext: Salazon stands up. Frightened and pretending not to be, hearing us out. He doesn't want to fight really.

Text.Value: Every spell I cast could be my last. You think I fear death?
Just calm down - I'm not here to fight.
Down you go - entrance is behind the wardrobe. You'll find a key in one of the crates.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing].
EditorData.logicalname: Salazon does not give us key.

Text.Value: Bugger.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching] Salazon readies fire bolt spell. Surprised, barely suppressed panic

Text.Value: *You spot a man crouching between the shelves - just as he spots you.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] [DUPE] Salazon is crouched behind a crate and is peering over the top, stealthily keeping watch. Looping idle. He notices the player, and readies a firebolt spell in his left hand > idle
EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves].

Text.Value: This is all pretty crude, as traps go - you'll probably kill us both.
That ain't the pass-phrase!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] [DUPE] From crouched, Salazon stands up frantic and aggressive, raising the firebolt spell in a threatening guesture, ready to attack.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fire bolt is still in hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: Salazon gets up frantically as he exclaims his line.

Text.Value: Your timing ain't the best, but I'm sure Zarys won't turn down a deal. Down you go, then.

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is standing]. Considering us, weighing his options - Zarys is someone he is afraid of, but he also doesn't want to fight us.

Text.Value: Wait - listen!
Flick out a single hand-sign: 'profit'.
'Little serpent, long shadow.' Don't want to die. 'Little serpent, long shadow.' Just say it!

EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behinnd the shelves with Fire Bolt ready]. Frantically repeating this over and over in his mind - it's a pass phrase he is repeating in his head, willing us to say it so he doesn't have ot fight

Text.Value: That spell, in close quarters? You're going to hurt yourself.
*A human man awaits you, a spell crackling at his fingertips.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Beau] [DUPE] Salazon is crouched behind a crate and is peering over the top, stealthily keeping watch with a firebolt spell in his hand.
EditorData.NodeContext: [Salazon is crouching behind the shelves with Fire Bolt ready].

Synopsis: Salazon is preparing a fire-trap at the entrance to his gang's hideout. We can either sneak up on him or be sneaked up on in turn - either way we have to convince him we should be there or he'll get skittish and blow us all up. In general he's jumpy and suspicious of us, but relieved when we convince him we're a friend. Think an inexperienced guard pointing a gun at us when he's been told to be on alert.
